SEARCH
Package farm.sales

Class ReceiptPrinter

Object
ReceiptPrinter
public class ReceiptPrinter extends Object
Utility class for pretty-printing a transaction as a receipt. Essentially a wrapper around an unusually complex toString, to avoid clutter.
(provided)

  • Method Details

    • createReceipt

      public static String createReceipt(List<String> headings, List<List<String>> entries, String total, String customerName)
      Creates a representation of a purchase by a customer for use in the CLI.
      Parameters:
      headings - headings to display.
      entries - the items for which to display information
      total - total price
      customerName - customer associated with the transaction
      Returns:
      String representation of the receipt

    • createReceipt

      public static String createReceipt(List<String> headings, List<List<String>> entries, String total, String customerName, String totalSaved)
      Creates a representation of a purchase by a customer for use in the CLI.
      Parameters:
      headings - headings to display.
      entries - the items for which to display information
      total - total price
      customerName - customer associated with the transaction
      totalSaved - total amount saved through discounts
      Returns:
      String representation of the receipt

    • createActiveReceipt

      public static String createActiveReceipt()
      Creates a receipt for a transaction that has not been finalised yet.
      Returns:
      the receipt to display.
